lines.text: Nobody steals from me. Nobody.

[Playing cards]
Hey, Dobbs, what do you drink with tonic?
Don't tell me.
Gin!
I said don't tell me.

[to Maxie]
I hope you'll enjoy Christmas in the Lost City.

[about the Chinese fighter]
He's moving like an animal.
More like a snake.

[Cheering Chris up]
NEW YORK CITY!
[repeated line]
Trust me.
Where did you get that haircut? In the Army?

[hesitating]
No,um... I'm a sailor.

[Before Chris' first fight]
Chris, I don't know about you but I'm planning to see Times Square again.
Chris! We were looking for you, weren't we?
Hmm, we were looking for you.
Good to see you again, my boy. You got a little muscle, now famous. I always said you'd make it, right?
Hmm.
You owe me.
Yes, I do, Chris. And I always repay my debts. What do you want?
The Golden Dragon.
The Golden what?
The Golden Dragon in the Lost City.
Lost City?
The best fighters will meet to compete in secret for the big dragon made of sun gold.

[together]
Sun gold?
You think you can win?

[hesitating]
No.

[impressed]
You're learning.
Man!Boss,these elephants are busting my rump.
Stop it, Harry, we could've been in Cairo on camels.

[Admiring The Golden Dragon]
Harry, our little pension fund.
Yeah. Hey, Boss, how come nobody's watching this thing?
Well, because they don't think anybody can lift it.

[Dobbs and Harry were caught for an attempt to steal The Golden Dragon]
What a mess!
Oh, yeah?

I'm sorry, kid, we tried to run out. I guess that's a difference between us. I've never ever said I was sorry before. And I've never had a quest and it wasn't for me, not the one. I wasn't always a pirate, you know. Believe it or not, but for over 20 years I was a Jack Captain of Royal Navy. I raised the Union Jack's countries that you haven't even heard of. Fought in a great war and for what? For the glory of God? For British Empire? For his Majesty King? And when it was all over, what have I got left with? Well how, you win something, you lose something. Now you just watch your tail, son.
Hey, clown boy! Get off of my street.
Wait a minute.
Hey, Dubois, what are you sick in the head or something? Please, grow up, go get yourself some new and nice clothes and come to work for me.
I don't work for nobody.
It's too bad, Dubois, it's too bad, you're a wasted talent, but nuts case, you know that. Suit yourself.

[to Chris after he failed to protect himself from an unexpected attack]
Be ready at all times. You'll learn that, or you'll never become a Muay Thai fighter.
It's over! Hit the gong!
[Khan breaks Phang's neck]
NOOOOO!

[after being hitted by Khan]
What the hell is this?
That's what you'll face at The Ghan-Gheng.
Good morning, Champ.
Good morning, my ass. You think I was born yesterday? You don't have anything to do with this damn Ghan-Gheng do you? Huh? And you're not no valet either. You're nothing but a CHEAP-LYING PUNK!
Take it easy.
Take it Easy? You're ain't no fighter either. You've wouldn't last One Round in a Real Fight. WHAT DO YA THINK OF THAT?

[Pushes Maxie]
HEY!

[Takes his coat off to fight with Chris]
You want some? Come on! COME ON!
